Game.Name: Franklin's Great Adventures (USA) (En,Fr,Es)
Game.plot: Overview:Franklin's Great Adventures is an adventure game for the Nintendo DS and Game boy Advance. Franklin is a young turtle is finding his way in the world, discovering how he fits in the world and how the world fits him. Any problems Franklin or his animal friends encounter they find problems and learn lessons, while also having fun along the way. This game take place in the summer where Franklin, Beaver and Bear set off to make new friends and help others in their village. Mini games helping villagers such as catching butterflies for Mr.Mole or looking for lost mail for Mr.Badger.
